root.name: Star Control 3
root.description: StoryDeep in space, somewhere in the Kessari Quadrant, you stumble across a catastrophic realization - the universe is on the brink of destruction. Now you must race to save thousands of worlds and billions of lives from total annihilation. An epic adventure of intergalactic strategy and diplomacy begins.AvailabilityThe game is available on gog.com and has been made playable on Windows XP, Vista and 7.

similar_games.game: Sins of a Solar Empire: Diplomacy
